name: featurd
description: Rappers, DJ's, and other musicians often collaborate with one another. Songs often include 'features' from other musicians. For the curious, this app is intended to be a quick way to look up who has worked with who, and check out a visual representation of an artist's network.

scripts.bundle: parcel build dist/js/entry.js --out-file bundle.js --out-dir dist/js --no-source-maps  && rm -rf dist/js/*.map
